code: import{getFilename}from'./AssetUris';export function isImageType(type){return /^(jpeg|jpg|gif|png|bmp|webp|heic)$/i.test(type);}export function getImageInfoAsync(url){if(false){return Promise.resolve({name:getFilename(url),width:0,height:0});}return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const img=new Image();img.onerror=reject;img.onload=()=>{resolve({name:getFilename(url),width:img.naturalWidth,height:img.naturalHeight});};img.src=url;});}
